CustomField.formula: "W" + TEXT(IF( CEILING( ( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE( YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ), 1, 1) + 1) / 7) > 52, 52, CEILING( ( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE( YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ), 1, 1) + 1) / 7) )) + "-" + TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)))
CustomField.label: Erstelldatum Wochennummer
